location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 1673/698 of 1872 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, HBM's Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, on special duty with the Zanzibar and Muscat Mission, at Aden, to The Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter informing the Accountant General that he had sent Government Resolution No. 7060 of 1872 to the Officer in charge of the treasury at Bushire instructing him to withdraw Pelly's pay.The letter also encloses two lists of contingent bills detailing expenses incurred by Pelly whilst on duty at Bombay in October and November 1872.
